mapper.select: select o.Specialid Specialid,o.Auctionbegintime Auctionbegintime,o.Auctionendtime Auctionendtime,o.Specialname Specialname,count(c.collectId) sc,count(b.Specialid) cj,count(t.tradingid) ppc,COUNT(DISTINCT(b.userid)) rs from tra_personalspecial o LEFT JOIN sys_collect c on o.Specialid = c.productId and c.collectType = '1' LEFT JOIN tra_Bidrecord b on o.Specialid = b.Specialid LEFT JOIN tra_trading t on o.Specialid = t.zcid and t.isAudit ='0' where o.is_best = '0' and o.Previewbegintimetime <= now() group by Specialid,Auctionbegintime,Auctionendtime,Specialname order by o.Previewbegintimetime LIMIT #{count}

select o.Specialid Specialid,o.Auctionbegintime Auctionbegintime,o.Auctionendtime Auctionendtime,o.Specialname Specialname,count(c.collectId) sc,count(b.Specialid) cj,count(t.tradingid) ppc,COUNT(DISTINCT(b.userid)) rs from tra_personalspecial o LEFT JOIN sys_collect c on o.Specialid = c.productId and c.collectType = '1' LEFT JOIN tra_Bidrecord b on o.Specialid = b.Specialid LEFT JOIN tra_trading t on o.Specialid = t.zcid and t.isAudit ='0' where 1=1
and o.Specialname like CONCAT('%',#{specialName},'%')
and o.Auctionbegintime > now()
and o.Auctionbegintime <= now() and o.Auctionendtime > now()
and o.Auctionendtime <= now()
group by Specialid,Auctionbegintime,Auctionendtime,Specialname order by o.Previewbegintimetime desc LIMIT #{beginIndex},#{endIndex}

select count(0) from ( select o.Specialid Specialid,o.Auctionbegintime Auctionbegintime,o.Auctionendtime Auctionendtime,o.Specialname Specialname,count(c.collectId) sc,count(b.Specialid) cj,count(t.tradingid) ppc,COUNT(DISTINCT(b.userid)) rs from tra_personalspecial o LEFT JOIN sys_collect c on o.Specialid = c.productId and c.collectType = '2' LEFT JOIN tra_Bidrecord b on o.Specialid = b.Specialid LEFT JOIN tra_trading t on o.Specialid = t.zcid and t.isAudit ='0' where 1=1
and o.Specialname like CONCAT('%',#{specialName},'%')
and o.Auctionbegintime > now()
and o.Auctionbegintime <= now() and o.Auctionendtime > now()
and o.Auctionendtime <= now()
group by Specialid,Auctionbegintime,Auctionendtime,Specialname order by o.Previewbegintimetime desc ) ttt
